title: Getting Your Spouse to Listen
itunes:author: Guests: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
Misunderstandings are part of marriage sometimes. How you respond to a misunderstanding can lead to weeks of tension or better conflict resolution with your spouse. Greg and Erin talk with John about how they've worked through tension in their own relationship. Featuring Dr. David Clarke.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
